body.name: Retro Game Stick,Retro Game Console,Retro Gaming Console,Wireless Retro Game Stick,Plug and Play Video Game Stick Built in 20000+Games,4K HDMI Output,9 Classic Emulators, Dual 2.4G Wireless Retro Game
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 13 hrs 18 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 19 hrs 48 mins
features: Built-in 20,000+ Retro Games: This wireless TV game console boasts an extensive library of over 20,000 retro games,the console comes pre-installed with 9 emulators for various game formats, including MAME, FC, GB, GBA, GBC, MD, SFC, ATARI, and PS1, Let you play games without repetition every day and bring back your memory to the fun of childhood,enjoy family entertainment time！

2.4G Wireless Controllers - This retro game console has upg.aded the game stick 2.4G wireless handle, it has complete functions, more advanced and comfortable texture. you can enjoy games with a friend or family member without being tethered by wires.

4K High Definition HDMI Output - The nostalgia stick video game supports HDMI output, 4k ultra-clear picture quality, high-speed screen operation and original quality control to capture details. The clearer and more realistic game screen ensures you a more comfortable gaming experience.

Multiple ways of playing - Equipped with dual 2.4G wireless controllers, it is possible for parents and children, couples or friends to go through levels or confront, compete, etc., double the happiness. (Note: To avoid confusion, only one controller can pick games, and the other controller can only play 2P games).

Retro Game Stick-The nostalgia stick game not only restores your childhood games, releases stress, but also can enjoy wonderful game moments with friends and family. It can also be given to children as the best gift to increase communication and feelings with children and let children experience the growth of their parents.
body.description: Introducing our retro game stick, the perfect way to relive your childhood memories! With over 20,000 classic games built-in and 9 pre-installed emulators, you can play all your favorite games without the need for downloads or internet. The 2.4GHz wireless controllers allow for easy and comfortable gameplay with friends or family. Simply connect the game stick to your TV using the included HDMI cable and start playing! The game stick is easy to set up and use, so you can start playing right away. This is the perfect gift for any gamer or anyone looking to relive some nostalgic moments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Product is incomplete, is not like actal games, and is garbage
reviews.reviewText: No power cord, no directions or user manual, old games ...not actually 4K. Buttons do not work. Some games do not function. Others function slowly. Poor graphics and cropping. And I paid too much. I'm returning mine. Don't waste your money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy plug and play, contains most of the game that I wanted
reviews.reviewText: Easy plug and play device. It contains most of the childhood games that I used to play and was looking for very long time. Comes with two controllers for multi player games. I am enjoying it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Does not work at all! Returned within 3 days. Complete piece of trash!! Don’t waste your time and money!Wish I could give negative stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Variedad de juegos
reviews.reviewText: Es súper divertido. Lo único que no me gusta es la calidad del video, pero que más se puede pedir a ese precio?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not what you think it is
reviews.reviewText: Am I honest opinion, the graphics are horrible the controllers are quirky and it is not any true arcade games they are just I'm sure copyright infringements it even says bootleg on one of the games. So even on a budget I could not recommend this. It's not that easy to maneuver through the menu and quite frankly I can't even believe they're selling this I went by the reviews but the reviews are not accurate it leads you to assume they might not be as accurate as they should.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my husband to replace a previous similar game. Disappointed in quality and ability to maneuver between games.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars System lags, poor technology
reviews.reviewText: Remotes don't work correctly, system lags, technology is not good, I returned mine, poor experience

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Collection of games
Retro Gaming console comes with wireless controllers
reviews.reviewText: This console has couple thousand of games out of which i only played couple of them which work well and the controllers are nice and moreover they are wireless and does not feel cheap. I enjoy playing some of the multiplayer games and also transferred Mario from google to this memory card so that i cam play that using the remotes which is such an amazing experience. I am happy with the games and controllers

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to set up and tons of old games
reviews.reviewText: It is easy to set up. And have some languages for you to choose. Also the controllers use 2 AAA battery. There are tons of old games to retrieve my childhood memories.
It's great and a has lots of storage and I use this over a ps3The only thing to keep In mind is the controller's use batteries
Great gaming emulator! Has lots of fun games. I love that it has two controllers to play verse an opponent.
This console game is awesome so fun to play with my son.. highly recommended
